title: Valid User Login with Correct Credentials
preconditions: Valid user account exists in the system
User is not already logged in

steps.expected: Login page loads successfully with email and password fields visible

steps.action: Enter valid email address in email field
steps.expected: Email is accepted and displayed in the field

steps.action: Enter valid password in password field
steps.expected: Password is masked and accepted
System processes authentication request
User is redirected to dashboard/home page with welcome message
Login page loads successfully
Email is entered in the field
Password is masked and entered
System attempts authentication
Error message 'Invalid email or password' is shown

title: Session Expiration After Timeout Period

steps.expected: User is authenticated and session is active

steps.action: Remain inactive for the configured timeout period
steps.expected: System tracks inactivity time

steps.action: Attempt to perform any action after timeout
steps.expected: Session is expired
User is redirected to login page with session expired message

expected_results: User is redirected to login page

title: Logout Functionality

steps.expected: User is authenticated successfully
Logout action is triggered
User is redirected to login page

steps.action: Attempt to access protected page using browser back button
steps.expected: Access is denied and user is redirected to login page

expected_results: User is redirected to login page

title: Password Field Masking and Security
preconditions: Browser developer tools can be opened

steps.expected: Login page loads successfully
Characters are masked as dots or asterisks
Input type is 'password'

steps.action: Verify password is not visible in browser inspect mode
steps.expected: Password value is not exposed in plain text

steps.action: Check if copy-paste is restricted (optional security)
steps.expected: Security policy is enforced as per requirements

expected_results: Password cannot be viewed in plain text

title: Login Form Validation and Error Messages

steps.expected: Login form is displayed

steps.action: Click login button without entering any credentials
steps.expected: Validation error messages appear for required fields
Email format validation error is displayed

steps.action: Enter valid email but leave password empty
steps.expected: Password required error message is shown

steps.action: Verify all error messages are user-friendly and clear
steps.expected: Error messages are descriptive and helpful

title: SQL Injection Attack Prevention in Login

steps.expected: Login page loads

steps.action: Enter SQL injection string in email field (e.g., ' OR '1'='1)
steps.expected: Input is sanitized

steps.action: Enter SQL injection string in password field
steps.expected: Input is sanitized
Login fails with appropriate error message

steps.action: Verify no unauthorized access is granted
steps.expected: User is not authenticated, system remains secure

title: Remember Me Functionality

steps.expected: Login page with 'Remember Me' checkbox is displayed
Credentials are entered successfully
Checkbox is selected
User is logged in successfully
User is still logged in or credentials are pre-filled

expected_results: User session persists across browser sessions
